member.name: T:OpenRA.Platforms.Default.ThreadedGraphicsContext
member.summary: Creates a dedicated thread for the graphics device. An internal message queue is used to perform actions on the device. This allows calls to be enqueued to be processed asynchronously and thus free up the calling thread.
